nodes.text: Astromech Heaven was a large astromech droid-orientated supermarket in the city of Lola Curich's starport on the planet Lianna. Open during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic, the shop sold most common astromech models at regular prices. Astromech Heaven also repaired most modern and common astromechs models, as well as servicing them in various ways. Services available included limb adjustments, memory wipes, logic circuit checks, and refilling of any fluids, which all took from one to three days, as did repairs depending on the level of damage.

Astromech Heaven was first described in Mission to Lianna, a adventure written by Joanne E. Wyrick for West End Games Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and released in 1992. It was included as a location players could potentially visit, although no actual events were described as taking place there.
